### PlaqView: an interactive portal to explore single cell RNA-seq of human coronary artery.

**Please be patient, it might take a while to query.** 

Use this module to explore gene expression of any **single** gene in different human coronary artery cell populations

To compare multiple genes' expression pattern, use the 'Compare Genes' tab. Hover over graphs for details or to zoom in/out. Use the 'download as png' function to export UAMP graphs.

*to save plot, right-click and 'save image as'", please cite Ma et al., (2021) and Wirka et al., (2019) in your publications*
